mapper.sql: select id, process_id, instance_id, counting_task_code, user_code, asset_code, create_time, update_time from asset_process_counting
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(b.task_name,"") as taskName,a.isCount,a.x from( select DATE_FORMAT(counting_time,'%m%d') as x ,COUNT(*) as isCount ,task_code from asset_process_counting WHERE counting_time is not null and DATE_FORMAT(counting_time,'%Y') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y') GROUP BY task_code,x ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from asset_inventory_task) b on b.task_code =a.task_code

select a.x ,IFNULL(a.isCount,0) as isCount,IFNULL(b.isExcept,0) as isExcept from ( select YEAR(counting_time) as x ,COUNT(*) as isCount from asset_process_counting WHERE counting_time is not null and DATE_FORMAT(counting_time,'%Y') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y') and DATE_FORMAT(counting_time,'%Y') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y') GROUP BY x ) a LEFT JOIN ( select YEAR(counting_time) AS x ,COUNT(*) as isExcept from asset_process_counting WHERE counting_time is not null and counting_status ='2' GROUP BY x ) b on a.x=b.x

select a.x ,IFNULL(a.isCount,0) as isCount,IFNULL(b.isExcept,0) as isExcept from ( select YEAR(counting_time) as yy, MONTH(counting_time) AS x, COUNT(*) as isCount from asset_process_counting WHERE counting_time is not null and DATE_FORMAT(counting_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y') GROUP BY yy,x ) a LEFT JOIN ( select YEAR(counting_time) as yy, MONTH(counting_time) AS x ,COUNT(*) as isExcept from asset_process_counting WHERE counting_time is not null and counting_status ='2' GROUP BY yy,x ) b on a.yy=b.yy and a.x=b.x
